body.p: Some stakeholders also acknowledged that their views on lessor accounting had changed over the life of the Leases project. These stakeholders noted that they had originally suggested that the IASB should address lessor accounting at the same time as lessee accounting. However, in response to the 2013 Exposure Draft, they suggested that no changes should be made to lessor accounting. These stakeholders had changed their views primarily for cost-benefit reasons.
